code:
function formatTime(time){var now=Date.now();var s=Math.round((now-time)/1000);// 0..15s - Just now
if(s<=15)return'Just now';// 16..59s - [x]s ago
if(s<=59)return s+'s ago';// 1..59min - [x]min ago
var min=Math.floor(s/60);if(min<=59)return min+'min ago';// 1..23h - [x]h ago
var h=Math.floor(min/60);if(h<=23)return h+'h ago';// 1..7d - [x]d ago
var d=Math.floor(h/24);if(d<=7)return d+'d ago';// 1..4w - [x]w ago
var w=Math.floor(d/7);if(w<=4)return w+'w ago';// 1..11m - [x]m ago
var m=Math.floor(d/30);if(m<=11)return m+'mth ago';// 1y - [x]y ago
var y=Math.floor(d/365.25);return y+'y ago';}export{formatTime};
